resources.string: EXCEED YOUR SKILLS WITH SEVERAL FUN AND INTERESTING GAMES.
What type of shark are you today?
Kids mode tones down the complexity of Quick maths questions. Other modes are coming soon.
If you suffer from photosensitive epilepsy, disable this option.
Select the type of math you want to solve.
Do you want the stopwatch to show?
You\'re scored based on the difference between quantity, answers correct and wrong. You\'re not scored when: any type of questions are disabled, timer is disabled or kids mode is enabled.

Timetrials scoring is based on the how many you got right and within what time. The elo is calculated by dividing how much you scored by how much time you took (in seconds). Same rules apply here. All types of questions need to remain enabled, timer enabled and kids mode disabled.

Advanced is a mixture of Quick math and Timetrials. You are scored based off of the difference between total answered, total correct and how much time you took to get there. A score will not be counted as the new high score if either of the validations are not true.
Welcome! There is no time limit here but you do have a stopwatch. You can click on it at any time to stop, restart or quit.
You will be asked long and windy but NOT hard questions. Same trick applies here - Look for the pattern!
I\'ll help you with this one - since the correct answer is:
Your score is up here. You got 1 right out of 1 question. You\'re all set, now start training that [your brain] beast!
Try to answer as many questions as you can before the timer runs out.
Analyze the question - Don\'t try to MATH-it. Look for the pattern. You can click on question board to stop and restart or quit at any time.
I\'ll help you with this one - since it\'s a correct equation. \n\nTap on correct.
I\'ll help you with this one - since it\'s a wrong equation. \n\nTap on wrong.
"You will get a feedback based on your answer. Keep an eye on the background as the color changes with timer. Tap on \"Good Job\" to proceed."
Touch the question board or the pause icon to stop and restart the game. And you are all set!
"Welcome! You have 10 seconds to find the correct equation. Timer resets if you find the correct one."
I\'ll help you with this one - since the correct answer is:\n "
. Tap on the button. You lose if you don\'t select the correct equation.
You will get a feedback based on your answer. Words of encouragement!.
This is your... Score. Pretty simple. You\'re all set! Tap on a wrong equation to bring up the scoreboard.
While you practice you learn, in a few years you will thank me;)
Can you guess the number I am thinking of?
Enter the maximum number and then guess the number:
TRY TO GUESS THE NUMBER I THOUGHT.
I think you missed the number HAHAHA
Enter a number and then hit submit.
Do not make yourself suffer like that either, let it be a number less than 200.
Enter a maximum number and then press play.
Your existing achievements and score will be uploaded shortly.
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
Stuck?\n Take a look at the clues
Wait for the ad to load or connect to the Internet...
First see the clue, then you can see the answer.
I am greater than 110 and less than 120 the sum of my digits is 9. \nWhat number is it?
Observe the sequence in detail, it is easier than you think.
If I have a hundred bulbs on, how many do I have off?
What is the number that if you take half away is worth zero?
In a tank there are 10 fish 2 drown 4 left and died. How many fish are there?
Following a healthy lifestyle for your brain and doing regular brain exercises can increase your cognitive reserve. \nKeep your brain as healthy and fit as your body with these incredible riddles.
If you stumble or get stuck in a riddle, you can discover a clue or the answer.

Remember the hierarchy of operations. \nMultiplication first.
Each number in the series is the result of the sum of the two previous numbers. \n(Fibonacci sequence).
Each number in the series is the result of the sum of the two previous numbers.
Nobody took any of them out and they all remain there, although there are some dead.
How many fish are left inside?
How fun it is to decompose numbers!
Look at the First digit with the Last digit
Tricky question, you need to read the question well;)
Look closely at the black lines
Motivation is what gets you going, habit is what keeps you going.
It is important to use your mind for everything, not just for Free Fire
You have that detective instinct, excellent.
To obtain the first digit, subtract (5â€“2) and for the second, add (5 + 2).
Solve the problems by dividing them into small pieces;)
The answer is hidden in the syllables of some of the words that make up the sentence.
Sometimes you have to cut down on problems, don\'t you think?
It is a number between 1 and 10
All right, if you keep doing this you will get a new super power!
Riddles effectively strengthen memory and understanding.
Add the tops of the triangles together.
You must find different ways to solve a problem, not all are solved the same;)
The answer is in your heart.
There are several ways to solve it, one of them is adding vertically.
The numbers are added and the result is the one on your left. For example, 3 is added to 4 and the result is 7 (the number to the left of 4).
Success is the sum of small efforts;)
You add the digits and multiply the result by itself.
